 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫חַל‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[2Kgs.3.16|2Kgs 3:16]]</sup> ==torrent, torrent-valley, wady== ([[Eccl.40.13|Eccl 40:13]]; [[Eccl.40.16|Eccl 40:16]] Late Hebrew id., stream (rare); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחְלָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***na—lu***</u></abbr> = Biblical Hebrew; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 140 Anm.</sup> thinks <span class="bdbLangGreek">Νεῖλος</span> may be from <span class="bdbLangGreek">Νεέλ</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחַל‎</span> pronounced \*<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִהִל‎</span>; on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> in Sabean proper name, of a location, see [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>Rev. Sémit. Iv (1896), 80, 1, 14</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Gen.32.24|Gen 32:24]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫חְלָה‎</span> [[Ps.124.4|Ps 124:4]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחַל‎</span> [[Gen.26.17|Gen 26:17]] +; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> locative, [[Gen.34.5|Gen 34:5]] so read also [[Ezek.47.19|Ezek 47:19]]; [[Ezek.48.28|Ezek 48:28]] (where [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלָ֫ה‎</span>; see [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]); dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלַיִם‎</span> [[Ezek.47.9|Ezek 47:9]], but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנַּחַל‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]]; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחָלִים‎</span> [[Num.21.4|Num 21:4]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלֵי‎</span> [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחֶלֶיהָ‎</span> [[Isa.34.9|Isa 34:9]] — 

**1.** ***torrent***, of rushing water in narrow channel [[Judg.5.21|Judg 5:21]] (3 t. in verse); [[Judg.4.7|Judg 4:7]]; [[Judg.4.13|Judg 4:13]]; [[Ps.83.10|Ps 83:10]] (all of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִישֹׁן‎</span>, q. v.); mountain torrent [[Deut.9.21|Deut 9:21]] (compare [[Exod.32.20|Exod 32:20]]); so [[Amos.5.24|Amos 5:24]] (simile of righteousness); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁוֺטֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנּ‎</span> [[2Chr.32.4|2Chr 32:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְיָנוֺת‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְזֶפֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶהְפְּכוּ נ‎</span> [[Isa.34.9|Isa 34:9]] simile of tears [[Lam.2.18|Lam 2:18]] hyperb.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֿׁ֑מֶן‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Mic.6.7|Mic 6:7]] ***torrents of oil***, compare of honey and curd [[Job.20.17|Job 20:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּלַגּוֺת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְהָרִים‎</span>); figurative<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְלִיַּעַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.5|2Sam 22:5]] ***torrents of worthlessness*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁבְּרֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָ֫וֶת‎</span>), = [[Ps.18.5|Ps 18:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> simile of glory of nations [[Isa.66.12|Isa 66:12]], figurative of invaders [[Jer.47.2|Jer 47:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִס‎</span>), or foes [[Ps.124.4|Ps 124:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫חְלָה‎</span>, see above); [[1Kgs.17.4|1Kgs 17:4]]; [[1Kgs.17.6|1Kgs 17:6]] (for drinking), drying up in summer v[[1Kgs.17.7|1Kgs 17:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָבֵשׁ‎</span>; all of Elijah's stream  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרִית‎</span>, q. v.); for drinking also [[Ps.110.7|Ps 110:7]], and (figurative) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲדָנֶיךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Ps.36.9|Ps 36:9]]; [[Job.6.15|Job 6:15]] (twice in verse) (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲפִיק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחָלִים‎</span>; in simile); of water bursting from rock [[Ps.78.20|Ps 78:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁטַף‎</span>, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span>), compare [[Ps.74.15|Ps 74:15]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְיָן‎</span>); figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקוֺר חָכְמָה‎</span> [[Prov.18.4|Prov 18:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹבֵּעַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם עֲמֻקִים‎</span>); more generally = stream, brook, river (chiefly late) [[Isa.11.15|Isa 11:15]] (divisions of river, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהָר‎</span>) in desert [[Isa.35.6|Isa 35:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span>), [[Jer.31.9|Jer 31:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלֵי מַיִם‎</span>), [[Ezek.47.5|Ezek 47:5]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.47.9|Ezek 47:9]] b (all strike out [[BDB#Co|Co]]), v[[Ezek.47.6|Ezek 47:6]] v[[Ezek.47.7|Ezek 47:7]] v[[Ezek.47.9|Ezek 47:9]]a (read<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנַּחַל‎</span>, see above), v[[Ezek.47.12|Ezek 47:12]] containing fish, etc. [[Lev.11.9|Lev 11:9]]; [[Lev.11.10|Lev 11:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמִּים‎</span>), [[Eccl.1.7|Eccl 1:7]] (twice in verse); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ י‎</span>, [[Isa.30.28|Isa 30:28]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺטֵף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>, [[Isa.30.33|Isa 30:33]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּפְרִית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>).


**2.** ***Torrent-valley, wady***, as stream-bed [[1Sam.17.40|1Sam 17:40]]; [[Neh.2.15|Neh 2:15]]; [[Isa.57.6|Isa 57:6]] with torrent flowing through it, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵיתָן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Deut.21.4|Deut 21:4]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.21.6|Deut 21:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ נַחֲלֵי מַיִם‎</span> [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲיָנֹת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְהֹמֹת יֹּצְאִים בַּבִּקְעָה‎</span>), compare [[Deut.10.7|Deut 10:7]], [[1Kgs.18.5|1Kgs 18:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְיְנֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַיִם‎</span>), [[Ps.104.10|Ps 104:10]] abode of Elijah [[1Kgs.17.3|1Kgs 17:3]]; [[1Kgs.17.5|1Kgs 17:5]] (compare v[[1Kgs.17.4|1Kgs 17:4]] v[[1Kgs.17.6|1Kgs 17:6]] v[[1Kgs.17.7|1Kgs 17:7]] above); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹרְבֵי נ‎</span> [[Prov.30.17|Prov 30:17]] (compare [[1Kgs.17.4|1Kgs 17:4]]; [[1Kgs.17.6|1Kgs 17:6]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבַּתּוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Isa.7.19|Isa 7:19]] as home of bees; fertile, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁכֹּל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Num.13.23|Num 13:23]]; [[Num.13.24|Num 13:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִבֵּי הַנּ‎</span> [[Song.6.11|Song 6:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְבֵינֿ‎</span> ***poplars of the wady*** [[Lev.23.40|Lev 23:40]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Job.40.22|Job 40:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Isa.15.7|Isa 15:7]] needing water [[Gen.26.17|Gen 26:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּרָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span>), v[[Gen.26.19|Gen 26:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[2Kgs.3.16|2Kgs 3:16]]; [[2Kgs.3.17|2Kgs 3:17]] place for refuse, ruins, etc. [[2Sam.17.13|2Sam 17:13]] in poetry also as wild, remote ravine [[Job.30.6|Job 30:6]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצוּר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַנְּחָלִים‎</span> [[Job.22.24|Job 22:24]] place of child-sacrifice [[Isa.57.5|Isa 57:5]] burial-place [[Job.21.33|Job 21:33]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִגְבֵי נ‎</span>), — [[Num.24.6|Num 24:6]] see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫חַל‎</span>.


>[!info] Note
> Particular wadys designate localities: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְנוֺן‎</span> [[Num.21.14|Num 21:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.2.24|Deut 2:24]]; [[Deut.2.36|Deut 2:36]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.3.8|Deut 3:8]]; [[Deut.3.12|Deut 3:12]]; [[Deut.3.16|Deut 3:16]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.4.48|Deut 4:48]]; [[Josh.12.1|Josh 12:1]]; [[Josh.12.2|Josh 12:2]] (twice in verse); [[Josh.13.9|Josh 13:9]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#D|D]]), v[[Josh.13.16|Josh 13:16]] v[[Josh.13.16|Josh 13:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Kgs.10.33|2Kgs 10:33]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁכֹּל‎</span> [[Num.32.9|Num 32:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.1.24|Deut 1:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשׂוֺר‎</span> [[1Sam.30.9|1Sam 30:9]]; [[1Sam.30.10|1Sam 30:10]]; [[1Sam.30.21|1Sam 30:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּד‎</span> [[2Sam.24.5|2Sam 24:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֶרֶד‎</span> [[Num.21.12|Num 21:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.2.13|Deut 2:13]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.2.14|Deut 2:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכֹּק‎</span> [[Gen.32.24|Gen 32:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.2.37|Deut 2:37]]; [[Deut.3.16|Deut 3:16]]; [[Josh.12.2|Josh 12:2]] (all [[BDB#D|D]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִדְרוֺן‎</span> [[2Sam.15.23|2Sam 15:23]]; [[2Sam.1.37|2Sam 1:37]]; [[2Sam.15.13|2Sam 15:13]]; [[2Sam.18.40|2Sam 18:40]]; [[2Sam.23.6|2Sam 23:6]] (twice in verse); [[2Sam.23.12|2Sam 23:12]]; [[2Chr.15.16|2Chr 15:16]]; [[2Chr.29.16|2Chr 29:16]]; [[2Chr.30.14|2Chr 30:14]]; [[Jer.31.40|Jer 31:40]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנָה‎</span> [[Josh.16.8|Josh 16:8]]; [[Josh.17.9|Josh 17:9]] (3 t. in verse) (all [[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺרֵק‎</span> [[Judg.16.4|Judg 16:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשִּׁטִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Joel.4.18|Joel 4:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְרַיִם‎</span> is southwest limit of Palestine (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***na—al*** [***mat***] ***Muƒri***</u></abbr>, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup> Par. 310</sup> [[BDB#Schr|Schr]]<sup>COT [[Num.34.5|Num 34:5]]</sup>) [[Num.34.5|Num 34:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Josh.15.4|Josh 15:4]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), v[[Josh.15.47|Josh 15:47]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Kgs.8.65|1Kgs 8:65]]; [[2Kgs.24.7|2Kgs 24:7]]; [[2Kgs.24.2|2Kgs 24:2]] Chron [[2Kgs.7.8|2Kgs 7:8]]; [[Isa.27.12|Isa 27:12]], + (omit <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מצרים‎</span>) [[Ezek.47.19|Ezek 47:19]]; [[Ezek.48.28|Ezek 48:28]] (see above); so read also possibly [[Amos.6.14|Amos 6:14]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבָה‎</span>: usually identified with ***Wâdy el-Arîsh***; on [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl's]] different view, see references below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְרַיִם‎</span> near the end); on identification of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Josh.15.7|Josh 15:7]]; [[Josh.19.11|Josh 19:11]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Sam.23.30|2Sam 23:30]] = [[1Chr.11.32|1Chr 11:32]]; [[2Chr.20.16|2Chr 20:16]]; [[2Chr.33.14|2Chr 33:14]], see Commentaries; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשֶׁד הַנְּחָלִים‎</span> [[Num.21.15|Num 21:15]], see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשֶׁד‎</span>.


**3.** ***Miner's shaft***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַץ נ‎</span> [[Job.28.4|Job 28:4]]. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַ֫חַל‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** perhaps ==palm-tree== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, noun of individual meaning <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; see [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>JQ, July, 1899, 688</sup>); — only plural absolute, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּנְחָלִים נִטָּ֑יוּ‎</span> [[Num.24.6|Num 24:6]] like palm-trees, which are stretched out, spread out (as to foliage). So [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>l.c</sup>, who compares <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כערבי נחל‎</span> , [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὡς στελέχη φοινικων</span>.
